name: Space Tanks
description:
Made in 48 hours for United Game Jam 2020.

HOW TO PLAY

Space Tanks is a two-player turn based shooter game set on the moon. Each player controls a tank and can manipulate the yaw, pitch, and power of the cannon. Players can move or shoot each turn (but not both). The goal: destroy the other player!

Relevance to Two: The game is two-player, there are two tank colors.
